title: POW's Hometown Worked For Years To Bring Him Home
teaser: Stefanie O'Neill has been leading the "Bring Bowe Back" campaign in Hailey, Idaho. NPR's Rachel Martin talks to O'Neill about the hometown reaction to POW Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl's release.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
